wf_element_activity.description: Ansible-Pull activity was written against ansible-pull versions >= 2.0. Arguments for ansible-pull on versions prior to version 2.0 may not work and are effectively not supported by this activity.
wf_element_activity.name: Ansible-Pull

wf_activity.notes: There is a newer version of this activity. To update the activity, check out the workflow, select the activity, right click and select update activity to use the latest version.
This activity was updated to a newer version since the workflow was published.
